    @allure.story("Negative - Invalid or nonexistent auction ID")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("auction_id", [
        -1,
        9999999,
    ])
    def test_get_auction_detail_negative(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade, auction_id):
        with allure.step(f"Send GET request with invalid auction_id: {auction_id}"):
            response = authenticated_api._client.get(f"/api/auction/{auction_id}")
    
        with allure.step("Check status code == 500"):
>           assert response.status_code == 500
E           assert 404 == 500
